Retrieve a list of all entities including their ID,name,tax_id,phone and address.

entity"},"tax_id":{"type":"string","description":"Tax identification number for the entity"},"phone":{"type":"string","description":"Phone number of the entity (nullable)"},"is_online_marketplace":{"type":"string","description":"Indicates if the entity operates as an online marketplace (e.g., Yes, No)"},"registration_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Date of registration for the entity"},"tax_exemptions_type":{"type":"string","description":"Type of tax exemptions applicable to the entity"},"is_default":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if this is the default entity"},"created_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who created the entity record (nullable)"},"updated_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who last updated the entity record (nullable)"},"address":{"type":"object","properties":{"location_code":{"type":"string","description":"Code representing the location"},"address_type_id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifier for the type of address (e.g., location)"},"line1":{"type":"string","description":"First line of the address"},"line2":{"type":"string","description":"Second line of the address (optional)"},"city":{"type":"string","description":"City of the address"},"region":{"type":"string","description":"State or region of the address"},"country":{"type":"string","description":"Country of the address"},"postal_code":{"type":"string","description":"Postal code of the address"},"start_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Date when the address becomes effective"},"created_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who created the address record (nullable)"},"updated_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who last updated the address record (nullable)"}},"required":["location_code","address_type_id","line1","line2","city","region","country","postal_code","start_date","created_by_id","updated_by_id"]}},"required":["name","guid","tax_id","guide","is_online_market","registration_date","tax_exemption_type","is_default","created_by_id","updated_by_id"],"title":"Entity","example":[{"id":"string","name":"string","guid":"string","tax_id":"string","phone":"null
